SEARCH
Package it.polimi.is23am10.client.userinterface.helpers

Class OutputWrapper

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.is23am10.client.userinterface.helpers.OutputWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class OutputWrapper extends Object implements Serializable
An helper class with all the methods needed to properly print CLI messages for client. It wraps System.out enriching it with colors.
See Also:

    • getString

      public String getString(OutputWrapper.OutputLevel level, String string)
      Helper method used by tests to retrieve the string to be printed before actually printing it.
      Parameters:
      level - OutputWrapper.OutputLevel of the message.
      string - The string of the message to display.
      Returns:
      The formatted string ready to be printed.

    • printString

      public void printString(OutputWrapper.OutputLevel level, String string, boolean cleanFirst)
      Public method to print a string. Used from CLI.
      Parameters:
      level - OutputWrapper.OutputLevel of the message.
      string - The string of the message to display.
      cleanFirst - Flag that resets the console before print if true.
